alert.note: Alert for Southeast Fayette; Southeast Raleigh (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 14 at 5:10PM EST until November 15 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 1 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Southeast Raleigh and Southeast Fayette Counties. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 1 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow...sleet...or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities...and use caution while driving. Additional information can be found at https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages, where you can also post your ice reports.
